subScenes.name: 礼貌问候
subScenes.description: 新员工向同事打招呼并请求帮助

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, could you help me out real quick?

responses.text: Of course! What do you need?
Sure thing! I'm happy to help.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开启求助，避免太正式

subScenes.name: 询问操作
subScenes.description: 请教复印机如何使用和设置

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm new here—how do I make copies? I'm not sure how to use this machine.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我是新人，怎么复印啊？我不太会用这台机器。

responses.text: No problem! Just press the big green button first.
responses.text_cn: 别担心，先按那个大绿键。

responses.text: You just put the paper in and hit copy—super easy!
responses.text_cn: 放好纸，按复制键，超简单的！

responses.text: Let me show you—it’s not complicated.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体动作词引导，避免抽象说明

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I set it to double-sided? I need to save paper.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能设成双面复印吗？我想省纸。

responses.text: Yep, just tap 'Duplex' on the screen.
responses.text_cn: 能，点屏幕上的‘双面’就行。

responses.text: You can! Look for the icon with two pages.
responses.text_cn: 可以！找那个两张纸的图标。

responses.text: Double-sided? Hmm, maybe not this one.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认功能时，优先用肯定句增强信心

subScenes.name: 确认数量与取件
subScenes.description: 确认复印份数并提醒取走文件

qaPairs.speakerText: How many copies do you want? I'll set it for you.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你要复印多少份？我帮你设。

responses.text: Five, please—and make sure it’s not too dark.
Just three—I don’t want to waste paper.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确数量时，搭配需求细节更自然

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, it’s done! Don’t forget to grab your copies.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了，印完了！别忘了拿走你的文件。

responses.text: Thanks so much—I really appreciate it!
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了，真的帮大忙了！

qaPairs.usageNote: 道谢时用具体表达更显真诚

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 完成复印后友好结束对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks again for showing me how to use the copier!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 再次谢谢你教我用复印机！

responses.text: Anytime! Just holler if you need help again.
responses.text_cn: 随时找我，有需要再喊我。

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时用开放句式鼓励后续求助
